subject: X Games
Skateboards
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The inherent danger associated with riding the Mega Ramp was on display at the X Games Thursday when the skateboarder Jake Brown fell more than 45 feet during his final run.
snippet: The inherent danger associated with riding the Mega Ramp was on display at the X Games Thursday when the skateboarder Jake Brown fell more than 45 feet during his final run.
